sentence.Network_en: It's very inconvenient to have to wait so long.
She arrived at an extremely inconvenient moment.

list.abs: 李开复谈创新 - ks_renyuan的日志... ... 马不需要吃饭睡觉嘛 Horse needs to be fed and needs sleep 很麻烦 Very inconvenient.
...时社会、经济的不济，让人看见了不愿面对，使人难堪的不方便的真相(inconvenient truth)，疫症正好去改变这些现状 — 不论是政 …
most consumers do not consider short - term traffic inconvenience factor ., 以外 , 大部分消费者已不考虑短期内交通不便的因素.
...民可以在美国起诉，但是问题在于美国法院和可能会以“不方便法院(forum inconvenience)”为由拒绝受理。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally in the sense 'incongruous' or 'unsuitable'): via Old French from Latin inconvenient-, from in- 'not' + convenient- 'agreeing, fitting' (see convenient). Current senses date from the mid 17th cent

entry.tran: 不方便的;打扰的;令人为难的
entry.def: Something that is inconvenient causes problems or difficulties for someone.

example.ex: Can you come at 10.30? I know it's inconvenient for you, but I must see you...
example.tran: 你能 10 点半来吗？我知道你不方便,但是我必须见你。

example.ex: It's very inconvenient to have to wait so long...

means.word_mean: 1. not suited to your comfort, purpose or needs;

sentences.sentence: "it is inconvenient not to have a telephone in the kitchen"
"the back hall is an inconvenient place for the telephone"
"an early departure is inconvenient for us"

auth_sentence.content: Was it really horrible or just bad and inconvenient?
auth_sentence.res_content: Was it really horrible or just bad and inconvenient?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was it really horrible or just bad and inconvenient?

auth_sentence.content: Plus, patients find the added security process inconvenient.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plus, patients find the added security process inconvenient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plus, patients find the added security process inconvenient.

auth_sentence.content: Would that be less inconvenient to you maybe?
auth_sentence.res_content: Would that be less inconvenient to you maybe?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would that be less inconvenient to you maybe?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in向内,成为,进入,使……+born出生的→adj.天生的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cent唱歌+ive……的→把精神唱进去→激励
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cis=cise切+ive……的→切入→入木三分
in向内,成为,进入,使……+door门→门内的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+spir呼吸+ed的→有呼吸的→有生命的
in不,无,非+visible看得见的→adj.看不见的, 无形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 效率低的, 效率差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+efficient有效的→adj.效率低的, 效率差的
in不,无,非+accurate正确的→adj.错误的, 不准确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无行动的, 不活动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+active积极的→adj.无行动的, 不活动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不充分的, 不适当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+adequate足够的→adj.不充分的, 不适当的
in不,无,非+calculable可计算的→adj.不可计算的
in不,无,非+capable有能力的→adj.无能力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不完全的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+complete完全的,圆满的→adj.不完全的, 不完善的
in不,无,非+constant稳定的→adj.多变的,无常的
in不,无,非+convenient便利的→adj.不便的, 有困难的
in不,无,非+corrigible可改正的→adj.积习难改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不明确的;不定的,模糊的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+definite明确的→adj.不明确的;不定的,模糊的
in不,无,非+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已"→冷漠的
in不,无,非+dign高贵+ant……的→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可避免的, 必然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+evitable可避免的→adj.不可避免的, 必然的
in不,无,非+human人道的→adj.不人道的
in不,无,非+imit模仿+able可以……的→不能模仿的
in不,无,非+justice公正→adj.不公正
in不,无,非+noc毒害+ous……的→无害的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+significant有意义的→adj.无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
in不,无,非+glor光荣+ious……的→不光荣的
in不,无,非+temperate自制的→adj.放纵的
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
indoor[adj.户内的]+s→adv.在户内
in向内,成为,进入,使……+curs跑+ion表名词→跑入→侵犯
in不,无,非+accuracy准确→n.错误
in不,无,非+difference不同→不不同→没什么不同,没什么了不起→冷漠,无足轻重
indifference[n. 不关心,冷漠,无足轻重]→n.漠不关心, 不在乎
in不,无,非+stability稳定→n.不稳定[性]
in不,无,非+significance意义→n.无意义
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
in向内,成为,进入,使……+put放→n.&v.输入
in向内,成为,进入,使……+augur=augury预兆,开始+ate表动词→进入开始→就职;参考:augury预兆
in向内,成为,进入,使……+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并
in向内,成为,进入,使……+flame火焰→v.使燃烧;激怒
in向内,成为,进入,使……+hale气→进气,吸气
in向内,成为,进入,使……+vigor活力+ate表动词→v.鼓舞,激励

Sentence.sentence: they are inconvenient to use in class
The inconvenient fact about most books, to which Google has arguably paid insufficient attention, is that they are protected by copyright.

means.word_mean: 不方便的, 打扰人的, 造成麻烦的, 让人不舒服的,引起麻烦的,造成困难的

sentences.en: He came at an inconvenient time.
Will it be inconvenient for him to attend that meeting?
sentences.cn: 他参加那次会议会不方便吗?
